mS0MCH7N3Qfx7JLZu.name: Directional
mS0MCH7N3Qfx7JLZu.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mwfiSGy4G3yHcSWvZ.name: Tough Skin
mwfiSGy4G3yHcSWvZ.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mxeRwmpgHVqP6xS_T.name: Oxygen Storage
mxeRwmpgHVqP6xS_T.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m-efTddktSAKUJNbk.name: Oxygen Storage
m-efTddktSAKUJNbk.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m6Thi-z_z-ZIqxGuP.name: Oxygen Storage
m6Thi-z_z-ZIqxGuP.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

maw0MIZeF2rh2Zpfa.name: Oxygen Storage
maw0MIZeF2rh2Zpfa.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mlJAnTgc0IKTVqWjP.name: Oxygen Storage
mlJAnTgc0IKTVqWjP.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mCYFKOl5stf8DlsC4.name: Diffuse
mCYFKOl5stf8DlsC4.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

m4AoMg1zU5q3lUNg6.name: Homogenous
m4AoMg1zU5q3lUNg6.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mipI2KhwOGuVZcKze.name: No Blood
mipI2KhwOGuVZcKze.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mTq6LfsBp15g7mW7V.name: No Brain
mTq6LfsBp15g7mW7V.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mEgGI1iX8rzefitDd.name: No Eyes
mEgGI1iX8rzefitDd.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

md_pi8kdaEKIAwHmr.name: No Head
md_pi8kdaEKIAwHmr.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mNwUkSODUacvlErOx.name: No Neck
mNwUkSODUacvlErOx.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mJtDqdvqnpYeclTkY.name: No Vitals
mJtDqdvqnpYeclTkY.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mktj6rpui85rK5eA4.name: Unliving
mktj6rpui85rK5eA4.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mWDusPPQIiQTfYfcO.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mprj5MOm-6NllLSV2.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mikH6IGUUnHfC7OOa.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
